name: DD Omino
description:
DD Omino is a  popular Match-3 game designed by DoonDookStudio with improved graphics and added gameplay mechanics. If you love Bubble Shooter or Tile-matching games, you’ll enjoy this great time spender game!
In this game, 3 same color rings in a Puzzle Board merge and get destroyed and you get point for it. All you should do is to match colorful circles horizontally or vertically in row. Match in a Chain for Higher Scores!

The graphics is designded for Christmas Time! But we can reskin and design new graphics. Do you have any special idea for designing this game?

You can share your ideas with us via email: doondookstudio@gmail.com

All the assets of the DD Omino are designed with DoonDookStudioincluding graphic design and music.

Visit Here for more information about this fun game!
